I feel more balanced and connected to myself than ever before.', rating: 5 }, { name: 'Michael R.', text: 'The life coaching sessions helped me break through limiting beliefs and create a clear path forward. Highly recommended!', rating: 5 }, { name: 'Emma L.', text: 'The spiritual guidance I received was exactly what I needed during a difficult time. Kalyāṇamitta has a gift for helping others find their way.', rating: 5 } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

A Friend on the Path

Healing & Guidance Rooted in Love and Wisdom

{/* Offerings Section */}

Offerings

Comprehensive healing, guidance, and support services designed to help you transform your life and connect with your authentic self.

Energy Work

Available in-person or virtual

Services Include:

  • Reiki and Energy Healing
  • Acupressure and Energy Bodywork

Life Coaching

Available in-person or virtual

Services Include:

  • Life Guidance
  • Spiritual Education and Tools
  • Understanding and relating to spiritual traditions in a healthy way
  • Authenticity Coaching, Perspective Shifting, and Matrix Breaking
  • Mens Issues Sexual Energy Transmutation and Relationships
  • Divine Masculinity and Femininity
  • Psychedelic Support and Integration
  • Deep Friendship & Holistic Support

Available in-person or virtual

Book a Session View Rates
{/* About Preview */}

About Kalyāṇamitta

My name is Adin. I grew up in Bethesda, Maryland, have lived all over the United States, and am currently Nomadic. People sometimes about my 'spiritual awakening' (or whatever you want to call it), and I can't put a finger on it! My growth feels rather continuous my whole life, what I was exploring as a child in early relationships. When I started to spontaneously experience what Tibetan Buddhists would call early practice of 'Dzogchen' at the age of 15, it felt utterly on point: Ah yes of course that's how it all is. I've learned a tremendous amount through Buddhism, Kabbalah, Christian Mysticism, Taoism, Modern Spiritualities and Modalities, and being a human in general. You could say I am polyamorous with the many spiritual traditions and practices of the world. But most of all I learn to trust inner guidance and Great Spirit.

Kalyāņa Mitta means Wise Friendship in Pali, the language the historical Shakyamuni Buddha spoke. I strive to be a true friend – one who benefits others’ lives via one’s own realization, wisdom, compassion, and virtue. I am determined to be part of the collective healing and awakening, offering the knowledge, love, and virtue that I have. My goal is to make my livelihood with deep integrity by doing what I actually love and feel most called to do: helping you: supporting the lives of all beings. I have a tremendous amount to learn and we are on this journey together. Thank you Great Spirit, my teachers, friends, and all the traditions I have learned from.

Learn More
